item.description:
Hi All,
With spring round the corner I thought it would be a great time to meet up and make new friends! So please plan to join me at Fosters in down town New haven for dinner and drink's (special rate for the group). Need an excuse to enjoy a martini? consider this Fosters will be donating

$2.00 from the sale of each pink ribbon martini to fight breast cancer!


Hope to see you all
item.how_to_find_us: can ask for me or the group

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: celebrating spring!
